plot: An exploratory journey through the jungle of Northern Amazonia, with Charles Montier and two Patamona Indians attempting the first descent of Guyana's Potaro River, from its source to its mouth.
title: Exploration Guyana
plot_es: An exploratory journey through the jungle of Northern Amazonia, with Charles Montier and two Patamona Indians attempting the first descent of Guyana's Potaro River, from its source to its mouth.
plot_en: An exploratory journey through the jungle of Northern Amazonia, with Charles Montier and two Patamona Indians attempting the first descent of Guyana's Potaro River, from its source to its mouth.
